Package org.pdxfinder.graph.repositories

Interface SpecimenRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Specimen,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.neo4j.repository.Neo4jRepository<Specimen,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Specimen,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Specimen,​java.lang.Long>
    @Repository
public interface SpecimenRepository
extends org.springframework.data.neo4j.repository.Neo4jRepository<Specimen,​java.lang.Long>
    Created by jmason on 08/06/2017.

    • Method Detail

      • findByExternalId

        Specimen findByExternalId​(@Param("externalId")
                          java.lang.String externalId)

      • findByExternalIdWithMolecularCharacterizations

        @Query("MATCH (sp:Specimen) WHERE sp.externalId = {externalId} OPTIONAL MATCH (sp)-[sfrm:SAMPLED_FROM]-(msamp:Sample)-[cb:CHARACTERIZED_BY]-(mc:MolecularCharacterization) RETURN sp, sfrm, msamp, cb, mc")
Specimen findByExternalIdWithMolecularCharacterizations​(@Param("externalId")
                                                        java.lang.String externalId)

      • findByModelIdAndDataSourceAndSpecimenIdAndPassage

        @Query("MATCH (mod:ModelCreation)--(spec:Specimen) WHERE mod.dataSource = {dataSource} AND mod.sourcePdxId = {modelId} AND spec.passage = {passage} AND spec.externalId = {specimenId} WITH spec OPTIONAL MATCH (spec)-[sfr:SAMPLED_FROM]-(s:Sample) RETURN spec, sfr, s")
Specimen findByModelIdAndDataSourceAndSpecimenIdAndPassage​(@Param("modelId")
                                                           java.lang.String modelId,
                                                           @Param("dataSource")
                                                           java.lang.String dataSource,
                                                           @Param("specimenId")
                                                           java.lang.String specimenId,
                                                           @Param("passage")
                                                           java.lang.String passage)

      • findSpecimenBySourcePdxIdAndPlatform2

        @Query("MATCH (mod:ModelCreation)-[sp:SPECIMENS]-(spec:Specimen)-[sfrm:SAMPLED_FROM]-(msamp:Sample)             -[char:CHARACTERIZED_BY]-(molchar:MolecularCharacterization)             WITH mod, spec, sp, sfrm,msamp, char,molchar             MATCH (molchar)-[pl:PLATFORM_USED]-(tech:Platform)             WHERE  mod.dataSource = {dataSource}              AND    mod.sourcePdxId = {modelId}              AND    (tech.name = {tech}  OR {tech} = \'\' )             RETURN spec, sfrm,msamp, char,molchar,pl,tech ")
java.util.List<Specimen> findSpecimenBySourcePdxIdAndPlatform2​(@Param("dataSource")
                                                               java.lang.String dataSource,
                                                               @Param("modelId")
                                                               java.lang.String modelId,
                                                               @Param("tech")
                                                               java.lang.String tech)

      • findByModelAndPassageAndNomenClature

        @Query("MATCH (mod:ModelCreation)--(sp:Specimen)--(hs:HostStrain) WHERE id(mod) = {model} AND sp.passage = {passage} AND hs.symbol = {symbol}WITH sp OPTIONAL MATCH (sp)-[sfr:SAMPLED_FROM]-(s:Sample)-[cbr:CHARACTERIZED_BY]-(mc:MolecularCharacterization)-[pur:PLATFORM_USED]-(pl:Platform) RETURN sp, sfr, s, cbr, mc, pur, pl")
Specimen findByModelAndPassageAndNomenClature​(@Param("model")
                                              ModelCreation modelCreation,
                                              @Param("passage")
                                              java.lang.String passage,
                                              @Param("symbol")
                                              java.lang.String nomenclature)

      • findByMolChar

        @Query("MATCH (sp:Specimen)--(s:Sample)--(mc:MolecularCharacterization) WHERE id(mc) = {mc} RETURN sp")
Specimen findByMolChar​(@Param("mc")
                       MolecularCharacterization mc)

      • findAllWithMolcharDataByModel

        @Query("MATCH (mod:ModelCreation)--(sp:Specimen) WHERE id(mod) = {model} WITH sp OPTIONAL MATCH (sp)-[sfr:SAMPLED_FROM]-(s:Sample)-[cbr:CHARACTERIZED_BY]-(mc:MolecularCharacterization)-[pur:PLATFORM_USED]-(pl:Platform) RETURN sp, sfr, s, cbr, mc, pur, pl")
java.util.List<Specimen> findAllWithMolcharDataByModel​(@Param("model")
                                                       ModelCreation model)
